General.Name: Wuxi Best Precision Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Best Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of precision parts, intelligent equipment, and tooling products in China and internationally. It offers turbocharger precision bearing parts, impellers, and middle and compressor casings; and engine blocks and other auto parts. The company also provides electric vehicle on-board charger modules, drive motor parts, controller parts, chassis safety parts, etc.; and new energy vehicles parts, such as hydrogen fuel cell vehicle air compressor impellers, air compressor pressure recovery products and rectifiers, motor housings, bearing covers, and functional components. In addition, it offers seat components, connectors, and other aircraft cabin parts; intelligent equipment and tooling products for use in automobiles and rail transit fields; intelligent manufacturing system integration products comprising aircraft fuselage automatic drilling and riveting systems; and production automation systems. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.
General.Address: No.18, Hehuan West Road, Wuxi, China
